title: Connecting delegators to SPOs.
description: 不信感から、単独のSPOでは商業的なベンチャー企業との競争に勝てず、モチベーションの低下→プールの閉鎖→中央集権化という流れになります。\[1\]\[2\]\[3\]

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is perfectly within the challenge goal, because I think this implementation will be core for the Cardano community and will help many delegators to choose best Cardano Stake Pools and allow Stake Pool to growth in the future.
This proposal is well written and clearly demonstrate  the experience and the team's commitment, guarantees solidity in deliverables, support transparency and accountability for all Cardano community.  This is an important proposal to integrate new ADA holders and connect them with the SPOs.
The proposal clearly articulates the contest, the problem (new tools for cardano delegators and SPOs) and how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem and for all of the stakeholders. Well done that the proposers team worked for prototype that help to understand the solution.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer team is very well skilled about the whole context and, knows the Cardano community very well because they work as SPO, developers, Plutus pioneers and Emurgo Academy participants.
The scope of the solution is well explained (e.g. how the funds will be spent, what features will be implemented, and so on…).
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones, coherent KPI metrics and a defined time horizon. The only thing I miss in this area is that the proposer has not mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them (e.g. difficulties in adoption of the tools/API…) The proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work and coherent budget with this challenge.

f6_assessments.q0:
Moving delegators from CEXs to SPOs is a problem that needs to be solved. You will have to scale and evolve to keep delegators from going back to CEXs with higher ROAs. Having an education portal alongside all the other info and tools in one place is good. I think you need to have some reward system in place for delegators that are on the platform. Something to keep them from going back to the CEXs. Maybe NFT drops for delegators that have staked for a very long period of time. OR rewards for staking on the empty pools, to help SPOs get more delegators. You don't have to reward SPOs as more delegators is reward enough. The main focus on rewards should go to delegators to keep them staking locally and not on a CEX. 
I believe this project can help alot and I would like to see what you come up with.
f6_assessments.q1:
The budget allocation seems fair and straight to the point. Already committed team onboard who knows what the Ecosystem needs. Adding more info or evidence regarding team experience would strengthen voter and CA trust. The beta website is great though. How will this project stay afloat after the funds run out. How will you be incentivized.
Maybe you could turn this into a DAO. That will attract delegators as well. Running a stakepool alongside this project will help with incentive distribution.
f6_assessments.q2:
Launch date and clear roadmap with milestones.
Defined success with Key performance indicators.
Clear plan of what the platform wants to be and could become. Haven't really addressed any potential challenges. How would you market this to reach unaware delegators. Maybe if a new SPO experiences tremendous growth on your platform they could pay it forward by paying for one marketing round to reach out to more delegators.
If this project becomes a DAO you would sort out so many future obstacles. I know you can't just have a
DAO in a day, but that could be your opener for getting more people on board and involved in the projects growth.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is at the right place and gives an interesting overview about their view on the problem. What might be useful to elaborate in more details is that how the operators and delegators will be convinced to use your services. What will be the service cost structure and how much traffic it is needed to operational costs. Make maybe a survey how much people would pay these service and make an ROI.
f6_assessments.q1: Experience is given on a team level, so the development part is covered. In the same way maybe the update related to marketing and ramp of stake pools and users would be useful.
f6_assessments.q2: The success factors and development are clear and auditable based on the given information.

f6_assessments.q0: I like this idea to help promote and connect people to smaller SPOs to improve the decentralization of the network.  I think there is a problem with people running multiple stake pools, and Cardano newcomers have difficulty finding information about stakepools besides those run by those with a large YouTube or Twitter following.  Daedalus wallet does a poor job providing information about stake pools as well.  True decentralization is the ultimate goal of the final era of Cardano, the Voltaire Era, and this project will help ensure that.
f6_assessments.q1: I think the team has a good plan and the experience to make this happen.
f6_assessments.q2: I would want to make sure of wallet integration and of partnership with an external wallet so people are able to stake directly on StakeBoard.  I would like more information on this.

f6_assessments.q0: I suppose this would fall under the "Integration" category of the challenge. while not likely to onboard new users, it does have the potential to onboard existing Cardano holders into the cohort of "intelligent" delegators which would undoubtedly benefit the network.
f6_assessments.q1: More information on the team members and their experience would be appreciated. That said, the project is pretty straightforward and the example website is attractive.  The pool-data space is pretty crowded and fractured, their biggest challenge will be gaining adoption.
f6_assessments.q2: The project goals are broken down over three months and proposed platform features are described specifically. Success is defined by number of active stakepools and users. It should be easy to audit the ROI of this project.

solution: SPOとデリゲーターがカルダノに関してつながり、利害関係を持ち、コミュニケーションをとり、研究し、教育し、協力するための信頼できるプラットフォームを作ります。
experience: 16年の技術経験を持つ国際的なチームメンバー。2020年10月よりSPO。Plutusの先駆者であり、Emurgo Academyの参加者。
